TopicTitle: The one thing that really grinds your gears.

Articles.Content: When someone won't turn the vacuum cleaner off before they unplug it.

Wifi. Just everything about wifi. It works on mobile devices most of the time, but when it doesn't work, it will never tell you why it doesn't work. It'll just say "unable to connect to network" and then refuse any attempts to make it work.

F[ ]k wifi.

You really know what grinds my gears? Worn or missing synchros. Clutchless shifting a synchronized box.

You really know what DOESN'T grind my gears? Double-clutching.
When people say mud is a bad thing.
You know what really grinds my gears? When my ship is leaving a celestial body, but i can't focus onto it for some reason.

Quantum Mechanics.

If you study it you know -.-
When people still use old brown ugly red eyed reaction wheels instead of the striped silver amazing circuity ones since .24 came out.

Easy, GGG "PoE" endgame interest is really a shame. I just wonder how long this kind of model will last on the market before people start to be heavily bored ...

EDIT: "if your only tool is FFA frustration, then all you matter start looking like moooooooaaaaaaaarrrr frustration charge overload, and then boom."

Edited September 18, 2014 by WinkAllKerb''

When people call a rocket a shuttle.

Me: Hey! Look at this Saturn V I drew!

Person McPerson: oh, nice shuttle.

Me: [annoyed grunt]

In game: That random jump and change in orbit when something goes over the SOI boundary in high warp. HEY GAME YOU DREW A FRICKIN LINE TELLING ME WHERE IT WOULD BE WHY DON'T YOU JUST PUT IT BACK ON THAT LINE WHEN IT CROSSES THE BOUNDARY!?

In life: People who won't pull forward at a red light so you can sneak past them and take your free right.

This imbecile who keeps posting everywhere on youtube his interesting theory, by which rocket engines can't work in space ...

Must have never heard about how to every action there's an opposite reaction.
not being able to build a rocket
When news reports use very bad puns.
When my SSTO doesn't want to carry cargo.

When no one get my wonderful puns.

I.E King sombrero

Willfully ignorant people.

We're all ignorant about certain topics, and that's okay, but if you're just going to smear your claims on everyone's face and then proceed to ignore hard evidence that directly contradicts them, I'm going to be really, really pissed.

I'm looking at you, creationists.

Edited September 20, 2014 by astropapi1

The sound of a cellphone vibrator. My most hated sound.

Why is this thing SO freaking LOUD? X-[

Have manufacturers forgot what the purpose of the vibration is?!

My 30$ Nokia is not like that, though. When it vibrates nobody hears it, and only I feel it. :^3
People going 15 miles below the speed limit making me late.
people saying they are getting their permit in my grade, while I have to wait two more years
When people think that zero-g is short for zero-gravity... if I had a penny for every time I corrected people...

When people use Barrel Roll instead of Aileron Roll. Seriously, those are 2 separate things, and the spinning plane while flying in a straight line thing is an Aileron Roll, but everyone says Barrel Roll.

Quoting an entire article (mission profile, dozens of images, what have you) to respond with a one-liner.

 

Learn to trim, people.

the Flat Earth Society.

 

'nuff said
Picky people, people who need what THEY want regardless of how ABSOLUTELY tiny it is.

I'd say other gears. They ruin perfectly normal gears eventually. I hate them.

 

On a serious note, conspiracy theorists or people who think humans aren't biologically meant to eat meat.

Edited January 15, 2016 by legoclone09
